section.p: Decide which item you are leaving here. (It must be either a weapon or a suit of armour.) You also have to leave a sum of money to pay the god for his services; decide how much.

exclude.reason: Molhern has already worked on this item!
This item is good enough already!

section.p: You camp out for the night not far away. Sometime after midnight you are woken by a hammering sound from the other side of the trees.
